mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_phone, u.password, u.real_name, u.user_addr, u.user_sex, u.user_age, u.user_card, DATE_FORMAT(u.created_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as created_date, r.room_num, u.live_status FROM user u LEFT JOIN room_user ru ON(ru.user_id = u.user_id) LEFT JOIN room r ON(ru.room_id = r.room_id) ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT u.realname, rr.room_rent, r.people_rent FROM user u LEFT JOIN user_rent_record urr ON(u.user_id = urr.user_id) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_rent_record_id, user_id, room_id, rent_money, start_date, end_date FROM user_rent_record ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) rent_record rr ON(u.user_id = rr.user_id) LEFT JOIN room r ON(rr.room_id = r.room_id) WHERE u.is_del = 0 AND DATEDIFF(NOW,urr.end_date) <= 7
